commit message: Started migrating to retrofit 2.0, still a lot of undocumented cases
Updated the retrofit 2.0 implementation. App compiles but crashes when trying to authenticate
Added a gson converter to retrofit and everything seems to work now, nice
Replaced useLibrary with the legacy http jar instead
Removed some dependencies and migrated to the official design libraries for the snakcbar
Updated the layout of the topplayer
Replaced the old gpodder library with my own
Ask for permission to download files when needed
Small speed inprovments when scrolling the playlist initially
Updated the view of the expanded playlist items
Added crashalytics to the google flavor. I hope the api keys are not too secret :)
Updated the free version to run without acra
